mdRecord.dcterms:title: Glued photos; 02 of 02
mdRecord.dcterms:description: 3. Doepner/Faulds--PhotographsItems 30-36An 8x10 photo of an unknown man in a suit and glasses with "Etching, Coleman" written in bottom corner that was poorly glued to (and ruined) another photo of 4 unknown people. This man was identified as the IAI founder, Harry Caldwell by an IAI member. In the other photo, it appears to be a family portrait, with what looks like "Gerloff" and other text written backwards across the top.; 2 items; DF n.a.
